title: Memes, Objects & Curiosities Hall
description: An unexpected corner of MarcaPágina where literary humor, collectible objects, and downloadable resources intersect. You'll find original memes, shareable designs, and merch pieces featuring phrases from our stories. Everything you didn't know you needed… and now can't stop looking at.
subtitle: Perfect for exploring, downloading, or gifting.

meme1.title: The Savage Grasshoppers
meme1.description: With the HBO series Sin querer queriendo back in the spotlight, we take the chance to recommend this author's best novel. "I was cordially invited to join visceral realism. Of course, I accepted. There was no initiation ceremony. Better that way." (1998)

meme2.title: Chapulín on the Beach
meme2.description: They didn't count on his cleverness. A parody intervention over Jack Vettriano's Billy Boys, reframed through The Savage Detectives (Anagrama, 1998). Visceral realism walks a Mexican shore.
